name: Nonocular
description:
A freak accident has left your temporarily without sight. But that doesn't mean you can't enjoy the annual Robot Day festivities! Use your auditory sensors to make your way around. Hint: try to build a mental map of the festival to keep you on the right path.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Turn Left and Right

Left Mouse Button - Pick up / interact

Mouse Scroll Wheel - Adjust mouse sensitivity

Escape - end the game

Made for Low Rez Jam. Low Rez? More like No Rez! ...Okay, the actual screen size is 10x10, and it's even larger for the WebGL version, but nothing ever gets rendered, I swear!

Unfortunately, a last-minute family emergency meant I couldn't put the last layer of polish on it. Hint: the brother in the concert has the exact same voice as the brother who sent you in the first place. But he's really shy or something so you'll have to talk to him by pressing the Left Mouse Button. Also I think the WebGL version is broken? Just download the Windows version until it's all fixed.

I'll also give proper attribution when this is all over I swear plz don't sue me
